entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: WIND WARNING , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:49 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Woodstock 09:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: ESE 23 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon then changing to rain at times heavy this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 9 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to 9 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
